channel.title: A Fatal Exception Has Been Thrown error
channel.description:
[URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/Untitled_2.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/Untitled_2.png[/img][/URL]
Pretty much says it all.. Can't figure out why my server continues to crash.. Any one run into this, fairly new to java..

item.title: A Fatal Exception Has Been Thrown error
item.dc:creator: @Blitzx Blitzx
item.description:
@Blitzx wrote:

Thanks a lot, yeah it was something i had done earlier… :palm:
appreciate it man !

EDIT*
The server crashed just like it did before, even after I removed what I had added to 1140…?

Read full topic
item.source: A Fatal Exception Has Been Thrown error

item.title: A Fatal Exception Has Been Thrown error
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Check line 1140 in the NPCHandler java file. Whatever it is, it’s trying to use something that is null.

Read full topic
